productDescription:
This upcycled quilted bomber was made from vintage silk blouse sourced in Zaandam. We have added padding, lining and quilted it. Produced in Zaandam.

Size: MEDIUM

Currently in stock. It is also possible to make another one in different size via direct order. Please allow 15 business days for production and delivery within the Netherlands.
